程序包 carte

类 Game

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
carte.Game
public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
A class representing the game core of the game Shape up.

Class Game mainly contains the following functions:

The realization of a total of six game modes, which are RegleClassicForTwo, RegleComputerClassicForTwo, RegleAdvancedForTwo, RegleSimpleForTwo, RegleClassicForThree, Regleclassicfortwo on TriangleTapisVisitor, select game mode, play cards, move cards, allocate and set most of the parameters needed for the game, reset the parameters etc.

This class uses the strategy pattern, observer pattern and visitor pattern. Among them, the strategy pattern is used to realize the virtual player. The visitor pattern is to tell the players that the game mode is to calculate the score under the rectangular or triangular chessboard. For exemple: 

     Game game = new Game();
     game.chooseModeRectangle(1);
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun
另请参阅:
Regle, Context, TriangleTapisVisitor, RectangleTapisVisitor, PlayerStrategy

    • setAgain

      public void setAgain​(boolean again)
      This method is synchronized method. It sets again isAgainSet when the player decides to play again or not. It wakes up the wating thread for the current object when the method is finished.
      参数:
      again - The player wants to play again or not

      参数:

    • notifyObv

      public void notifyObv()
      This method encapsulates two methods which is used in the class which extends the class observable.

    • playCard

      public java.lang.String playCard​(int x, int y, Joueur j)
      This method is synchornized method which defines the step playing card by the player.

      When the player does not get the card or the position of the card does not conform to the adjacent rule, the method prompts the player that the coordinates are illegal.

      If the coordinates are legal, this method places the card on the chessboard, sets the card to be placed, refreshes the chessboard, informs the player that the card has been placed, and notifys the observers that the state is changed.

      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of the position to place
      y - The y-coordinate of the position to place
      j - The player who is playing card
      返回:
      Returns (@code text} whether the card is placed successfully
      另请参阅:
      RectangleTapisVisitor.ajouterCarte(int, int, Carte), RectangleTapisVisitor.refresh()

    • moveCard

      public java.lang.String moveCard​(int x, int y, int a, int b)
      This method defines the step moving card by the player.

      If the card is not moved and there is the card to be moved on the chessboard tapis, perform the following procedure.

      If the card movement is illegal, the player will be informed.

      If the card movement is legal, move the card and notify the observers that the state has been changed.

      If there is no corresponding card to move on the chessboard, inform the player.

      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of the initial position of the card to be moved
      y - The y-coordinate of the initial position of the card to be moved
      a - The x-coordinate of the position to be moved to
      b - The y-coordinate of the position to be moved to
      返回:
      Returns (@code text} whether the card is moved successfully
      另请参阅:
      RectangleTapisVisitor.isLegalMove(int, int, int, int)

    • ok

      public java.lang.String ok()
      This method is synchronized method which defines whether the player's round is finished.

      If the card has not been placed, let the player know.

      Otherwise, it tells the player that this round has been completed, and gives the right to draw cards to the next player, resets the parameters, notifys the observers that the state has been changed.

      At the end of the method, it wakes up the waiting thread on the current object.

      返回:
      If the player's turn is over

    • waitForChooseMode

      public void waitForChooseMode()
      This method waits the player to choose the mode of the game when the mode has not been choosed yet and tells the player that the mode is choosed when the player has choosed the mode.

      If the mode has not been choosed yet, the thread will sleep for 1000 millisecond.

      另请参阅:
      Throwable.printStackTrace()

    • chooseModeRectangle

      public void chooseModeRectangle​(int choice)
      This method is used to select the mode of the game.

      It provides a total of six choices, which are RegleClassicForTwo, RegleComputerClassicForTwo, RegleAdvancedForTwo, RegleSimpleForTwo, RegleClassicForThree, regleclassicfortwo on TriangleTapisVisitor.

      It implements the mechanism of each game mode.

      And at the end of the mode chosen, all relevant parameters are reset.

      This method is applied the visitor pattern to tell the players that the game mode is to calculate the score under the rectangular or triangular chessboard.

      参数:
      choice - The mode to choose
